subject: Issue of policy guidelines for delegation of powers for approval of Change of Scope (CoS) in EPC National Highway Projects
text: Hny Tr4 TTTHTf xifeasrut 744 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (e& Tart 3)TTytarf 1T4) n4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Q 6, d7-10 , ERGT , T frrt-110075 6-5 & 6. Sector-10_ Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 25.04.2016 POLICY MATTERS-Technical (205/2016) (Decision Taken in 1ogth Meeting of the Authority on Agenda Item No. 108.13) Sub: Issue of policy guidelines for delegation of powers for approval of Change of Scope (CoS) in EPC National Highway Projects. The issue of delegation of powers for approval of Change of Scope (COS) in EPC National Highway Project has been deliberated in 108th Meeting of NHAI Board held on 05.04.2016 and it has been decided that: The concerned Member with concurrence of Member (Finance) can approve Change of Scope proposals up to 5% of contract value and the Executive Committee (EC) may approve the same upto 10% of contract value b) Change of Scope proposal in excess of 10% of the contract value may be put up for approval of the Authority: Approval of revised cost, wherever necessary, shall be obtained from MoRT&H: 2. This issues with approval of the Competent Authority: Kaw {N.K Sharma) CGM (Coord:) To: All Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices MQdm INHAL
